#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
using namespace std;

int ex[10];

int gcd(int a, int b)
{
	if (b == 0) return a;
	else return gcd(b, a % b);
}

int main()
{
	ex[0] = 1;
	for (int i = 1; i < 10; i++) 
		ex[i] = ex[i - 1] * 10;

	int j,n,a,k,p,q,g;
	char str[11];
	for (int i = 1; cin >> j, j != -1; i++)
	{		
		cin >> str;
		n = atoi(str + 2);
		a = n / ex[j];
		p = n - a;
		k = strlen(str + 2) - j;
		q = ex[k + j] - ex[k];
		g = gcd(p,q);
		p /= g;
		q /= g;
		printf("Case %d: %d/%d\n", i, p, q);
	}
}
